bordered.description: Whether or not to display the border

closable.description: Whether or not to display the 'close' icon

content.description: The contents of the dialog, which can be a 'render' function
content.description_zh: 对话框内容，可以是 `render` 函数

icon-placement.description: The location where the icon is placed

:icon.description: It needs to be a 'render' function

loading.description: Whether or not to display a 'loading' status

:negative-button-props.description: Cancel the properties of the button

negative-text.description: The text of the cancel button will not appear if the corresponding button is not filled
negative-text.description_zh: 取消按钮的文字，不填对应的按钮不会出现

:positive-button-props.description: Confirm the properties of the button

positive-text.description: If you do not fill in the text of the button, the text of the button will not appear
positive-text.description_zh: 确认按钮的文字，不填对应的按钮不会出现

title.description: The title of the dialog, which can be a 'render' function
title.description_zh: 对话框标题，可以是 `render` 函数

events.name: close
events.description: Click the callback function that was executed when closed
events.description_zh: 点击关闭时执行的回调函数

events.name: negative-click
events.description: The callback function that is executed when 'negative' is executed
events.description_zh: 执行 `negative` 时执行的回调函数

events.name: positive-click
events.description: The callback function that is executed when 'positive' is executed
events.description_zh: 执行 `positive` 时执行的回调函数
